text: Yuliani Sentosa (born 29 October 1971) is a retired badminton player from Indonesia. She won 1991 Badminton Asia Championships in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. == Achievements == === Asian Championships === Women's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year !
